txt.en:
Good Adventurer,

The day approaches when all must leave this world and find another, in which to continue on their journeys.

The number of active worlds is being reduced, and the World Consolidation event will provide you with steps required to make the move. The new transfer process will soon become available for this world, and, for the duration of the event, free. (Until then, transfers have been disabled.)

Please take the time now to review which worlds will remain active (below) and to coordinate with your friends and Kinships for orderly moves to a new home.

Kin Leaders have added responsibilities: they should organize their Kinships to choose a new world and then move before the other members, in order for the Kinship to automatically re-form. 

For more updates and information, please visit the Lord of the Rings Online website and follow us on social media.

Here is the list of worlds that will remain after the server consolidation is complete.

US:
Brandywine
Gladden
Landroval
Crickhollow
Arkenstone

EU:
Laurelin
Gwaihir
Sirannon
Evernight
Belegaer
